yaml.description: Background on Vaibhav Srivastav aka VB, Developer Experience Engineer focused on AI.

markdown.markdown:
::: {.callout-card data-label="Snapshot" data-tone="accent"}
**Current role.** ML Developer Advocate at Hugging Face stewarding audio-first LLM research and on-device ML ergonomics.

**Past hats.** Freelancer, tax analyst, consultant, and long-time volunteer with EuroPython, PyCons across APAC, Google Cloud Delhi, and Facebook Developer Circles.

**Coordinates.** Delhi native → Stuttgart researcher → Paris-based builder.
:::


I help teams tell better ML stories by pairing technical rigor with a conversational tone. If you want a quicker update, hop over to the [Now page](/now).

## Me in ten minutes

I’m an engineer at heart who likes to fix more things than he breaks. I research and democratise niche audio understanding, enhancement, and generation systems at the University of Stuttgart & Hugging Face.

I’ve consulted across the board—from scrappy startups to Fortune Technology 10 firms—to help them weave ML into day-to-day workflows and make sense of messy unstructured data silos. Along the way I co-founded a [Machine Learning for Audio study group](https://github.com/Vaibhavs10/ml-with-audio), mentor ML folks coming from non-traditional backgrounds, and continue to host research salons for friends across Europe.

::: {.side-note}
I’m always game for research collaborations and freelance consulting work. Ping me on Twitter ([@reach_vb](http://twitter.com/reach_vb)) and we’ll figure out the rest.
:::

### Timeline for context

::: {.callout-card data-label="Trajectory" data-tone="warm"}
- **2014.** Marketing & sales funnel analytics for Microsoft Lumia campaigns in India.
- **2016.** Freelance analytics for print + social media agencies (mid five-figure revenue, paused after burnout).
- **2017.** Data science consultant @ Deloitte US-India delivering across 12 countries (> $3M impact).
- **2020.** Moved to Germany to study NLP & speech.
- **2023.** Landed in France to keep democratizing NLP & speech.
:::
